Sometimes the avoidance takes more energy than the thing itself.

One thing that might help when you're feeling that "shut down" response: there's a technique where you acknowledge what your brain is doing without fighting it. Next time you think about the statements and feel that pull to avoid, try saying out loud: "My brain is offering me the thought that looking will be unbearable."
